main div div div:nth-of-type(1) div:nth-: Create credentials to access your Stream feature
main div div div:nth-of-type(2) div div: Please note: Client credentials are displayed only once and are will not appear after the session expires. Make sure to securely store your credentials immediately after creation. You can create up to 3 clients per session.
main div div div:nth-of-type(3) div h2: No clients have been created yet.
main div div div:nth-of-type(3) div p: Click the Create credential button to get started.
